main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Memphis, Tennessee on 24 July 1952.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by a Memphis Municipal Airport Traffic Controller and two other witnesses., The object was described as a white light moving too fast for an aircraft and did not resemble a meteor., No air traffic was reported in the vicinity at the time of the sighting., Weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility during the sighting., The primary witness's occupation qualifies him as a capable observer.
sighted object: a white light moving in a northeasterly direction
witness description: Memphis Municipal Airport Traffic Controller and two other persons
